subject: Simsonn haptic VAM Pro powersupply
description_text:
Dear Service Team,

I bought a Simsonn Pro Plus pedal second hand.
I have the plus x pedal control box with it.
I see on your website there is a possibility to upgrade with linear motors.
Can I order them with EU power plug power supply? If yes do I need to note
it somehow in the order?

Thank you in advance!

BR


*Gaál Tibor*
*Ügyvezető*

*GT THERM TECHNOLOGY Kft*
1089 Budapest, Orczy út 43.


gttherm@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Gaal Tibor,     You can add a note if you need an EU power plug. By default, we’ll include the plug type that matches the destination country.
